song_lyrics: To koī din jangalmā rahīe... odhvajī 1
Koī din khāvāne shīro ne pūrī,
To koī din bhukhyā rahīe... odhvajī 2
To koī din sādā farīe... odhvajī 3
Koī din sūvāne gādī ne takiyā,
To koī din bhoy par sūīe... odhvajī 4
Bāī Mīrā kahe Prabhu Giridhar nāgar,
title: Rām rākhe tem rahīe odhavjī

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-888: Meerabai

Category: Prakirna Pad
